Name: Dead Dreams
About the game: DEAD DREAMS is a story-driven, 2D psychological horror game focused on puzzle-solving and atmosphere. A school game dev club of four friends breaks up after the tragic death of one of their members. Until... a sinister ‘V’ would force them back to their memories of those events and how it changed their lives. Every puzzle, creature and story element reflects the character's fears and dreams. 35+ disturbing and uncanny creature designs. Multiple characters and complex non-linear story. 5-8 hours long. Atmosphere, sound design and story inspired by the Silent Hill series. Fully animated cutscenes. CONTROLS: Arrows = Move SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text) NEED HELP? FOUND A BUG? /
